entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect logic of the Picker element when an item in a binded collection is deleted #29235
  • Android WebView Navigated is fired without setting source #29233
  • Android Orphan Overlay Leading to App Freeze #29227
  • Lightweight instances of controls remain in memory after navigation when “Collapse small object types” is disabled #29224
  • I9_Incremental_loading_on_scroll - Jumping back to the top of the list as you scroll down. #29223

Closed

  • [Android][iOS] CollectionView.CanReorderItems does not work #13100
  • [Android] Setting IsBusy to True on MainPage of Shell app will cause crash #13138
  • CollectionView: IsVisible - expand selected rows fails on iOS #15112
  • IOS 14+: TabBar disappears after Long-press back button #16576
  • Window.ModalPopping closes app when e.Cancel = true #23462
  • App crash when is started from another app. #19374
    Backlog
  • [Android] .NET 9 Maui - Crash with CreateWindow method - SingleInstance #28906
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Rotating an image with an animation results in a wobble #15116
    Backlog
  • Click And TapGestureRecognizer is not working on Windows #29073
  • Memory Leak is detected when using Border #29023

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix WebView Navigated is fired when source is null #29234
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Scrolling Feature #29230
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Re-Enabled UI Test - Issue10222Test #29226
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Removed Frame styles from the default project template #29222
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [inflight/current] [Inflight] Fix Build Issue in [2025/04/28] Candidate #29231
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • add global xmlns in template #29203
  • Fixed - On iOS GestureRecognizers don't work on Span in a Label, which doesn't get IsVisible (=true) update from its parent #29024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [net 10.0 Testing] Enabled CachedFilenameIsCorrectAndValid test #29143
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Selection Feature #29165
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • fixed typo in Connectivity.shared.cs #29213
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29158 - [2025/04/28] Candidate #29168
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing][Inflight] Fix failing test case in [2025/04/28] Candidate #29161
    area-testing, community ✨, test-flight, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • ScrollView CrossPlatformMeasure - refactor #27085
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Top bar item colors - fix #26964
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] TimePicker focus & unfocus events #26949
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] ListView ContextActions in modal page #26854
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [iOS] List view headers - fix #26826
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Fix for UITest Catalyst screenshot dimension inconsistency and image cropping issue #29204
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [WiP] SafeArea #28556
    area-layout, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/04/28] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29158
  • [DO NOT MERGE][net10.0] 20250414 net10.0 ecosytem updates #28997
  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Implemented the Resize and Downsize functions in the W2DImage class #29138
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed Unstable order of Flyout Items with conditional visibility #29197
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ImagePaint Not rendering in View #29205
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for ItemSpacing value being retained when re-entering CollectionView with ItemsLayout set to vertical or horizontal list after navigating back. #29190
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Controls Disappear When WebView is Used with Hardware Acceleration Disabled #28934
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker items do not appear when tapping on the picker after navigating through PushModalAsync #28003
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the OneWayBinding issue with MultiBindingConverter on Slider and Stepper Value #28219
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Shell content title not rendering in Full-Screen Mode on MacCatalyst #28468
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the flyout icon and content page disappeared when focus on the shell search handler #28474
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Scrollview.ScrollTo execution only returns after manual scroll #28528
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Re-enabled flaky UI test TextInEditorShouldScroll #29167
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness, partner/syncfusion
  • Updating FlyoutPage layout when parent window size changes #29209
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
